name: Windowns 4-20
description:
Windowns 4-20 is a game  about uninstalling FoF (not an obvious copy of LoL). But here is the thing:

You cannot simply drag FoF into the recycle bin, you must gather compressed parts of the uninstaller to achieve your goal.

Unlock the resources you need by diving into Jorge´s PC and getting to know him by reading his emails to a friend, Laura.
